1.content:
Kaela and her blond hair taking cover under her coat waiting at the house of her friend Ashley, the april shower haven taken her by surprise. The bottom of her warn in jeans jeans getting wet as the rain continued, even worse was the fact that she only had flip-flops on, why did she thought it’ll be a good evening to wear them over to her friends house.

Knocking again the door opened only for Ashley to be on the other side dressed in purple sweeter to keep her warm also wearing a pair of white PJs to blink looking at the soaked Kaela who quickly made her way into the room, shivering as she did so.
“Hey Kay… why didn’t you bring an umbrella or something?” Ash asked looking at her who then glared back before sighing slightly, her white tank top still dry.
“I didn’t know it was going to rain did I?” she replied hanging her coat up and then taking off her flip-flops still shivering slightly.

Kaela blinked looking at Ashley’s PJs before giving a sigh “Oh man I forgot my sleeping stuff… I’m going to have to go back to my house to grab some” she said looking at Ash who smiled and shrugged “Ah don’t worry about it, you can wait till it stop raining and the four of us will head over to yours to grab them, okii?” she asked happily.

Ash shifted her hair from her face, she was trying something she’d done before but liked the outcome the stile now was Blue bangs, red fringes at the front, natural at the top and back.
“So why you rushed me over in such a hurry? It was because of you rushing me that I forgot my PJs” Kay asked before seeing the other shoes of two other people, one being some worn in trainers and the other pair some black boots.
“Well I found an old game called ‘Ijou-Yuugi’ in the attic and I had the house to myself so I invited some of our friends over for a game of it, I mean why not?” she asked smiling.

Taking Kaela into the living room where the two other girls where, Kaela smile and waved at them, there was Hailey who had her dark blue short sleeve T shirt on with some yellow writing say something that Kaela could never quite make out because of her dirty-blonde hair getting in the way of it, like Ash Hailey had PJs, these ones however where pink with red dots on them. Sitting next to Hailey was Lacey, the oldest of the group she wore a big white shirt which hung over her black skirt, she hadn’t put her PJs on just yet but she still had her fishnet leggings on because of how comfortable she felt in them.

So after a chatting for a few minutes and talking the rules over which simple seemed to be, role the dice, more that many spaces forward and whoever gets to the end wins, the game mentions a reward but it wasn’t sure what it was, the girls picked there peaces which was Red for Kaela, blue for Ashley, yellow for Hailey and green for Lacey. Finally they where wondering how to pick who’ll go first.
1.title: And so the game begins

11.content:
Taking the Die, Kaela smiled as she rolled the dice. Watching them bounce on the board before rolling to a holt at 2 and 1, giving her a total of 3.
“Aww man, that’s crap” she said to herself but the other girls giggled slightly, Kaela sat up to move her peace forward but she blinked looking at the peace as it moved 3 spaces forward by itself.

“Woah…” the girls say at once looking at the peace in awe, Lacey was about to say something when Hailey said excitingly “Hey looky, there’s some writing showing up in the center” she said pointing to the black glass oval as writing started to form as if from fog.

The fog said the following…
11.title: Kaela (Red) goes first

111.content:
‘The first move of the game, the players are off,
There are powers within at which you would scoff.
But to prove the power that I possess,
Sprout a fox tail and an extra two breasts.’


Kaela blinked reading it in her head, her mind not making any sense of it, looking around at the other girls and they didn’t seem to make any sense of it at all either.
Ashley poked the board a bit
“It sure is one weird ass game” she said and giggled picking up the die and handing it to the confused Lacey “I guess it’s you turn…”

However, after she dropped the die into Lacey’s opened hand Kaela gasped loudly as she begun to feel awfully dizzy, holding her head before beginning to feel an itchy feeling right above her butt. She went to scratch it only to find something furry there to great her, she looked around and screamed in horror as a foxes tail grew and pushed its way out of her bottoms, she was so shocked and panicked about that she didn’t notice what the other girls where screaming about.

With her free hand she mover it where the others where pointing she didn’t dare look as she gently patted her breast, she then went lower down to see what they where so shocked about she then blinked confused, she was patting her breast again, but how could that be?

She turned her back at her friend and took a good peek under her shirt and screamed loudly in panic, the three friends jumped in shock, Lacey dropped the die as she was startled. The noise of the die hitting the floor and bounced filled the room, all four girls, including the newly changed Kaela fell silent as they watched the die land on a total of eleven, the green peace on the board moved forward by itself.

The girls looked at each other before leaning it to look at the glass bobble, wondering what it was going to say.
111.title: The first move of the game

112.title: Free Choice

1123.content:
Lacey decided that she would go next and pick up the die. She rolled and got a 7 and a 3.
"Alright, I get to move ten spaces!" She said as she moved up ten. After she moved her hand away, the fog came back and started toleave. Underneath it said,

"Help me! I can't move!" She screamed
"I have an idea,": Hailey added, "How about we don't talk about what the game tells us." All the girls nodded, except for Lacey who couldn't move her head.

131.content:
At first, Hailey didn't believe a word of it; a board game could make you grow taller?

But then, after convincing herself it wasn't just a placebo, the young teen could definitely feel her clothes growing tighter. The three pairs of eyes watching her were just as spooked, and Hailey could tell that her height was indeed increasing!

"Ahh shit. What's happening?!" She squealed, torn between fear and excitement at this prospect. Her clothes were stretching at the seams, becoming closer and closer to simply tearing from her ever expanding body.

The six foot mark was quickly breached, and Hailey didn't look like she was stopping there!

Her shirt tore from her shoulders, and she blushed furiously as she had to cover her exposed bra - which was growing tighter and more painful by the second. Hailey continued growing, having her dignity forced away from her with each item of clothing that tore away. The growing simply refused to cease until the fourteen year old stood at...
131.title: Hailey grows taller

choices: They continue playing the game, hoping Hailey will shrink on her next turn.
They destroy the game, hoping that will reverse Hailey's growth.
1312.content:
Her head scraping against the ceiling of their attic, Hailey the fourteen year old giantess was torn between shock and excitement; "Holy crap, I'm huge!"

The three older girls shot each other nervous glances, mostly due to the fact that she was taking up almost the entirety of the room, and also there was the minor issue about her being butt naked. Oh, and the three were in a rather compromising position as well; Hailey had to splay her legs to avoid breaking walls with them, trapping all three of them between.

"You guys are so tiny, too!" Hailey squealed, picking up Ashley in one hand and lifting her up high, "Who'd've thought a board game could do somethin' like this?!"

"Y-yeah, tell me about it." Ashley gasped, her breathing somewhat restricted by Hailey's strong grip around her chest.

"So... unless we work out a way to shrink me again or something, it looks like we're all stuck here." Hailey 'announced', a small grin tugging at her lips, "So, what do?"

The three girls looked around anxiously for some means of escaping from the room, however that was hopeless; Hailey's legs were surrounding the room, blocking off all windows and doors.

Flummoxed, a decision was eventually made;
1312.title: Twenty feet tall.

135.title: Other

info.brief_description: Can't change the rules, but you can change the players
info.description:
Finding an old game in the attic a group of girls play a game that will not only change there lives, but also there bodys.

Kaela Apps – 18 years old

5’3”, 95 lbs, 30C. Caucasian, blonde hair.
Cute, friendly, but a little vain. She’s rather concerned with her appearance, though mostly due to a lack of self-confidence. She has a very conservative exterior, but has a considerable wild side.

Ashley Hughes – 17 years old

5’2”, 100 lbs, 32C. Japanese-Caucasian, black hair (Typically dyed.).
Playful, cute, youthful but not immature. She’s a great friend to those she likes, often helping out her friends and being a friendly person in general. She’s a little punkish and loves anime, and can be a rather unorthodox person. She can be rather scary when angered, though.

Hailey Anderson – 14 years old

5’4”, 115 lbs, 34C. Caucasian, dirty-blonde hair.
Nice, outgoing and rather popular, though she doesn’t usually let it go to her head. She can be a tad naïve and is rather active, playing a lot of sports. She is a shoe-in for the cheerleading squad, but she never bothered to sign up, believing they were too snobby for her.

Lacey McAllistair – 19 years old

5’7”, 130 lbs, 34D. Caucasian, brown hair.
Quiet, shy, but outgoing when she needs to be. A rocker girl, she often acts the part, though she never looks hardcore into it. She can often be found wearing rocker girl clothes of sorts, though, such as boots and fishnets. She can seem rather foreboding and intimidating, but she is usually harmless.
